name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious PowerShell Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed a malicious PowerShell script that led to data exfiltration and lateral movement within the internal network.

if-condition--f2b4f5b6-c832-4401-af3b-0a.name: Check if malicious process is running

action--b6540f05-b388-47ed-b3d1-5ce7e1cf.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--b6540f05-b388-47ed-b3d1-5ce7e1cf.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes that are executing malicious scripts.

action--d8c2d9f0-65c8-4e93-8b4c-39100e47.name: Isolate infected host
action--d8c2d9f0-65c8-4e93-8b4c-39100e47.description: Block network access from the identified infected IP address.

while-condition--f5a1ed72-3c9b-4d29-a0df.name: Full System Scan Loop
while-condition--f5a1ed72-3c9b-4d29-a0df.description: Repeat the full system scan until no threats are detected.

action--b3e9d626-8ee6-4dc0-af78-2fe33210.name: Perform full system scan
action--b3e9d626-8ee6-4dc0-af78-2fe33210.description: Execute a full system scan to identify any additional threats.
